required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: The Safety, Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of Single Ascending Doses And The Effect Of Food On Oral WCK 4873 In Healthy Adult Volunteers
clinical_study.official_title: Double-Blind, Randomized, Placebo-Controlled Study To Evaluate The Safety, Tolerability And Pharmacokinetics Of Single Ascending Doses And The Effect Of Food On Oral WCK 4873 In Healthy Adult Volunteers

brief_summary.textblock: This is a double-blind, randomized, placebo-controlled study, consisting of a single ascending dose (SAD) part and a 2-way crossover food effect (FE) part. Each subject will participate in only one cohort during the study.

study_design_info.masking: Quadruple (Participant, Care Provider, Investigator, Outcomes Assessor)

primary_outcome.measure: Assessing incidence of treatment emergent AEs
primary_outcome.description: Incidence of treatment emergent AEs, abnormal clinical laboratory findings, variations in LFTs, abnormal physical examination findings, variations in vital signs and variations in 12-lead ECG
plasma PK parameters -Area under curve (AUC0-t, AUC0-12, AUC0-24, AUC0-inf, %AUC)
plasma PK parameters- maximum concentration (Cmax, Clast)
plasma PK parameters tmax, tlast, kel, tÂ½,
PMN white blood cell concentrations of WCK 4873.

arm_group.description: 100 to 1200 mg in tablets (the 100 mg dose cohort will receive half a tablet; higher dose cohorts will receive 1 or more tablets)

intervention.description: 100 to 1200 mg in tablets (the 100 mg dose cohort will receive half a tablet; higher dose cohorts will receive 1 or more tablets)

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- BMI : 18-30 kg/m2 (Body Mass Index [BMI] [kg/m2] = Body weight [kg] Height2 [m2])
- Ability and willingness to abstain from alcohol, methylxanthine-containing beverages or food (coffee, tea, cola, chocolate, "powerdrinks"), grapefruit (juice) from 48 h prior to entry in the clinical research center until discharge
- Medical history without major pathology
Exclusion Criteria:
- Evidence of clinically relevant pathology
- Mental handicap
- History of relevant drug and/or food allergies
- Regular/routine treatment with non-topical medications within 30 days prior to entry into the clinical research center
- Smoking within 60 days prior to drug administration and through the follow-up visit
- History of alcohol abuse or drug addiction (including soft drugs like cannabis products)
